title: The Demons Fib
description: For a thrilling adventure/ fantasy novel for young adults look no further!The Demons fib is a novel full of vampires, elves, wolves and demons and is quick to the point. Characters are forced together when their fates are woven together in a dark and unnatural way. A Legend becomes real in this fantasy and as the story unfolds it will have you questioning who is really the demon. Nothing is as it seems
author: Keisha Keenleyside
